Attacks.Name: Powder Snow
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Freeze special condition, reducing their movement by half during their next activation.

Attacks.Name: Ice Shard
Attacks.Effect: This attack deals piercing damage. After the attack is resolved, the target character reduces its defense by 1 for the rest of the turn.

Attacks.Name: Blizzard
Attacks.Effect: This attack affects all characters (friend and foe) within range 2 of the target character. Characters hit by this attack gain the Chill special condition, reducing their attack strength by 1 until the end of their next activation.

Superpowers.Name: Snow Cloak
Superpowers.Effect: When this character is targeted by an attack, if there is another character within range 2, the attacker must roll 1 fewer attack die.

Superpowers.Name: Frosty Retreat
Superpowers.Effect: After being targeted by an attack, this character may use this superpower to immediately move S.

Attacks.Name: Icy Wind
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, the target character gains the Slow special condition, reducing their movement by S during their next activation. If a wild is rolled, apply the Slow condition to all enemy characters within range 2 of the target.

Superpowers.Name: Winter's Resilience
Superpowers.Effect: Remove all damage from this character and gain the Frozen Armor special condition, adding 1 to its defense for the rest of the game. This superpower can be used only once per game.
